verbose_text: Consistent with our previous findings with stable transfection of inducible DN-Tcf4 in DLD-1 CRC cells, and transient transfection of this vector in HCT-116 cells [XREF_BIBR], basal expression of stably transfected DN-Tcf4 is minimal in the presence of doxycycline and absence of butyrate, but is at high levels in the presence of both agents.
